blocks.name: csubgr
blocks.content: Extend class notation with subgraphs.
blocks.origin: const class csubgr { SubGraph }

blocks.name: diff.csubgr.s
diff.csubgr.c
diff.csubgr.w
df-subgr
blocks.content: Define the class of the subgraph relation. A class ` s ` is a _subgraph_ of a class ` g ` (the _supergraph_ of ` s ` ) if its vertices are also vertices of ` g ` , and its edges are also edges of ` g ` , connecting vertices of ` s ` only (see section I.1 in [Bollobas] p. 2 or section 1.1 in [Diestel] p. 4). The second condition is ensured by the requirement that the edge function of ` s ` is a restriction of the edge function of ` g ` having only vertices of ` s ` in its range. Note that the domains of the edge functions of the subgraph and the supergraph should be compatible. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: relsubgr
blocks.content: The class of the subgraph relation is a relation. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: subgrv
blocks.content: If a class is a subgraph of another class, both classes are sets. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: issubgr
blocks.content: The property of a set to be a subgraph of another set. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2020.)

thm issubgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3)‚Üí(c2[SubGraph]c0 ‚Üî(c4 ‚äÜ c5 ‚àß c6 =(c7 |` dom(c6))‚àß c8 ‚äÜ P(c4))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Vtx ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(iEdg ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(Edg ` c2)
} = {
  syl6bbr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), c2[SubGraph]c0, (c4 ‚äÜ c5 ‚àß c6 =(c7 |` dom(c6))‚àß c8 ‚äÜ P(c4)), ((Vtx ` c2)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c0)‚àß(iEdg ` c2)=((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2)))‚àß(Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2))))
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c3, (c2[SubGraph]c0 ‚Üî((Vtx ` c2)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c0)‚àß(iEdg ` c2)=((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2)))‚àß(Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2)))))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0, c1, csubgr, ((Vtx ` c2)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c0)‚àß(iEdg ` c2)=((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2)))‚àß(Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2))), ((Vtx ` hs0)‚äÜ(Vtx ` hs1)‚àß(iEdg ` hs0)=((iEdg ` hs1)|` dom((iEdg ` hs0)))‚àß(Edg ` hs0)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` hs0))))
  3anbi123d((hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c0), (Vtx ` hs0)‚äÜ(Vtx ` hs1), (iEdg ` hs0)=((iEdg ` hs1)|` dom((iEdg ` hs0))), (Edg ` hs0)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` hs0)), (Vtx ` c2)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c0), (iEdg ` c2)=((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2))), (Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2)))
  sseq12d((Vtx ` hs0), (Vtx ` hs1), (Vtx ` c2), (Vtx ` c0), (hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c0))
  adantr(hs0 = c2, hs1 = c0, (Vtx ` hs0)=(Vtx ` c2))
  adantl(hs0 = c2, hs1 = c0, (Vtx ` hs1)=(Vtx ` c0))
  fveq2(hs1, c0, cvtx)
  eqeq12d((iEdg ` hs0), ((iEdg ` hs1)|` dom((iEdg ` hs0))), (iEdg ` c2), ((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2))), (hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c0))
  adantr(hs0 = c2, hs1 = c0, (iEdg ` hs0)=(iEdg ` c2))
  reseq12d((iEdg ` hs1), dom((iEdg ` hs0)), (iEdg ` c0), dom((iEdg ` c2)), (hs0 = c2 ‚àß hs1 = c0))
  adantl(hs0 = c2, hs1 = c0, (iEdg ` hs1)=(iEdg ` c0))
  fveq2(hs1, c0, ciedg)
  adantr(hs0 = c2, hs1 = c0, dom((iEdg ` hs0))= dom((iEdg ` c2)))
  dmeqd((iEdg ` hs0), (iEdg ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, ciedg)
  adantr(hs0 = c2, hs1 = c0, ((Edg ` hs0)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` hs0))‚Üî(Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2))))
  sseq12d((Edg ` hs0), P((Vtx ` hs0)), (Edg ` c2), P((Vtx ` c2)), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cedg)
  pweqd((Vtx ` hs0), (Vtx ` c2), hs0 = c2)
  fveq2(hs0, c2, cvtx)
  df-subgr(hs0, hs1)
  3anbi123i(c4 ‚äÜ c5, c6 =(c7 |` dom(c6)), c8 ‚äÜ P(c4), (Vtx ` c2)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c0), (iEdg ` c2)=((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2))), (Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2)))
  sseq12i(c4, c5, (Vtx ` c2), (Vtx ` c0))
  eqeq12i(c6, (c7 |` dom(c6)), (iEdg ` c2), ((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2))))
  reseq12i(c7, dom(c6), (iEdg ` c0), dom((iEdg ` c2)))
  dmeqi(c6, (iEdg ` c2))
  sseq12i(c8, P(c4), (Edg ` c2), P((Vtx ` c2)))
  pweqi(c4, (Vtx ` c2))

  diff.hs1.w(((Vtx ` c2)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c0)‚àß(iEdg ` c2)=((iEdg ` c0)|` dom((iEdg ` c2)))‚àß(Edg ` c2)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c2))))
}

blocks.name: issubgr2
blocks.content: The property of a set to be a subgraph of a set whose edge function is actually a function. (Contributed by AV, 20-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm issubgr2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wb(wbr(c3, csubgr, c0), w3a(wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c2), wss(c8, cpw(c5)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cvtx, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cedg, c3))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wbr(c3, csubgr, c0), w3a(wss(c5, c6), wss(c7, c2), wss(c8, cpw(c5))), w3a(wss(c5, c6), wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7))), wss(c8, cpw(c5))))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wcel(c3, c4), wb(wbr(c3, csubgr, c0), w3a(wss(c5, c6), wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7))), wss(c8, cpw(c5)))))
  issubgr(c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c2, c8)
  3anbi2d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wss(c5, c6), wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7))), wss(c8, cpw(c5)), wss(c7, c2))
  impbid2(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wcel(c3, c4)), wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7))), wss(c7, c2))
  mpbiri(wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7))), wss(c7, c2), wss(cres(c2, cdm(c7)), c2))
  resss(c2, cdm(c7))
  sseq1(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7)), c2)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wfun(c2), wcel(c3, c4), wi(wss(c7, c2), wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7)))))
  ex(wfun(c2), wss(c7, c2), wceq(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7))))
  eqcomd(c7, cres(c2, cdm(c7)), wa(wfun(c2), wss(c7, c2)))
  funssres(c2, c7)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Fun(c2)‚àß c3 ‚àà c4)‚Üí(c3[SubGraph]c0 ‚Üî(c5 ‚äÜ c6 ‚àß c7 ‚äÜ c2 ‚àß c8 ‚äÜ P(c5))))

  mpbiri(c7 =(c2 |` dom(c7)), c7 ‚äÜ c2, (c2 |` dom(c7))‚äÜ c2)

  eqcomd(c7, (c2 |` dom(c7)), (Fun(c2)‚àß c7 ‚äÜ c2))

blocks.name: subgrprop
blocks.content: The properties of a subgraph. (Contributed by AV, 19-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm subgrprop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wceq(c4, cres(c5, cdm(c4))), wss(c6, cpw(c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  mpcom(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wceq(c4, cres(c5, cdm(c4))), wss(c6, cpw(c2))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  subgrv(c0, c1)
  ancoms(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wceq(c4, cres(c5, cdm(c4))), wss(c6, cpw(c2)))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c0, universe)), wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wceq(c4, cres(c5, cdm(c4))), wss(c6, cpw(c2))))
  issubgr(c1, universe, c0, universe, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
}

thm subgrprop(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c4 =(c5 |` dom(c4))‚àß c6 ‚äÜ P(c2)))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Edg ` c0)
} = {
  mpcom(c0[SubGraph]c1, (c2 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c4 =(c5 |` dom(c4))‚àß c6 ‚äÜ P(c2)), (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c1 ‚àà ùïå))
  subgrv(c0, c1)
  ancoms(c0 ‚àà ùïå, c1 ‚àà ùïå, (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚Üí(c2 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c4 =(c5 |` dom(c4))‚àß c6 ‚äÜ P(c2))))
  biimpd((c1 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå), c0[SubGraph]c1, (c2 ‚äÜ c3 ‚àß c4 =(c5 |` dom(c4))‚àß c6 ‚äÜ P(c2)))
  issubgr(c1, universe, c0, universe, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)
}

blocks.name: subgrprop2
blocks.content: The properties of a subgraph: If ` S ` is a subgraph of ` G ` , its vertices are also vertices of ` G ` , and its edges are also edges of ` G ` , connecting vertices of the subgraph only. (Contributed by AV, 19-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm subgrprop2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5), wss(c6, cpw(c2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cedg, c0))
} = {
  syl(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wss(c4, c5), wss(c6, cpw(c2))), w3a(wss(c2, c3), wceq(c4, cres(c5, cdm(c4))), wss(c6, cpw(c2))))
  subgrprop(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6)

blocks.content: An edge of a subgraph of a hypergraph is a nonempty subset of its vertices. (Contributed by AV, 17-Nov-2020.) (Revised by AV, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm subgruhgredgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cuhgr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, csubgr, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
} = {
  mpdan(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))), w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))))
  syl(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wbr(c3, csubgr, c4))
  subgrprop2(c3, c4, c2, cfv(cvtx, c4), c0, cfv(ciedg, c4), cfv(cedg, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c3))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wne(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls))
  sseldd(cfv(c0, c1), cpw(c2), cfv(cedg, c3), wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))))
  simpr3(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))
  syl6eleqr(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cedg, c3), crn(cfv(ciedg, c3)), wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))))
  syl(wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(cfv(ciedg, c3))), wa(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c3)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3)))))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wa(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c3)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3)))))
  jca(w0, wfun(cfv(ciedg, c3)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3))))
  syl2anc(w0, wfun(cfv(ciedg, c3)), wcel(c4, cuhgr), wbr(c3, csubgr, c4))
  subgruhgrfun(c4, c3)
  syl5eqel(cfv(c0, c1), crn(cfv(ciedg, c3)), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c3), c1), wa(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c3)), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3)))))
  fveq1i(c0, c1, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  fvelrn(cfv(ciedg, c3), c1)
  edgval(c3)
  eqnetrd(cfv(c0, c1), emptycls, cfv(cfv(ciedg, c4), c1), wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))), wceq(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c4), c1)), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c4)))
  simpr2(w0, wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(c0)))
  eqcomd(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c4), c1), w3a(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wcel(c1, cdm(c0))))
  funssfv(cfv(ciedg, c4), c0, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2)))), wne(cfv(cfv(ciedg, c4), c1), emptycls), wcel(c4, cuhgr), wfn(cfv(ciedg, c4), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c4))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c4))))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wcel(c4, cuhgr))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wfn(cfv(ciedg, c4), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c4))))
  funfnd(cfv(ciedg, c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wfun(cfv(ciedg, c4)), wcel(c4, cuhgr))
  uhgrfun(c4, cfv(ciedg, c4))
  adantr(w0, w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cvtx, c4)), wss(c0, cfv(ciedg, c4)), wss(cfv(cedg, c3), cpw(c2))), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c4))))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c4))), wbr(c3, csubgr, c4), wcel(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3))))
  syl6eleq(c1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3)), cdm(c0), w0)
  dmeqi(c0, cfv(ciedg, c3))
  subgreldmiedg(c3, c4, c1)
  uhgrn0(c4, cfv(ciedg, c4), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c4)), c1)
  eqid(cfv(ciedg, c4))
  eldifsn(cfv(c0, c1), cpw(c2), emptycls)
}

thm subgruhgredgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)‚àà(P(c2)\ { ‚àÖ }))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(iEdg ` c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà UHGraph)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3[SubGraph]c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
} = {
  mpdan(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà(P(c2)\ { ‚àÖ }), (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)))
  syl(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), c3[SubGraph]c4)
  subgrprop2(c3, c4, c2, (Vtx ` c4), c0, (iEdg ` c4), (Edg ` c3))
  eqid((Vtx ` c4))
  eqid((Edg ` c3))
  sylanbrc((w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))), (c0 ` c1)‚àà(P(c2)\ { ‚àÖ }), (c0 ` c1)‚àà P(c2), (c0 ` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ)
  sseldd((c0 ` c1), P(c2), (Edg ` c3), (w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))))
  simpr3(w0, c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4), c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4), (Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))
  syl6eleqr((c0 ` c1), (Edg ` c3), ran((iEdg ` c3)), (w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))))
  syl((w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))), (c0 ` c1)‚àà ran((iEdg ` c3)), (Fun((iEdg ` c3))‚àß c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c3))))
  adantr(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), (Fun((iEdg ` c3))‚àß c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c3))))
  jca(w0, Fun((iEdg ` c3)), c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c3)))
  syl2anc(w0, Fun((iEdg ` c3)), c4 ‚àà UHGraph, c3[SubGraph]c4)
  subgruhgrfun(c4, c3)
  syl5eqel((c0 ` c1), ran((iEdg ` c3)), ((iEdg ` c3)` c1), (Fun((iEdg ` c3))‚àß c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c3))))
  fveq1i(c0, c1, (iEdg ` c3))
  fvelrn((iEdg ` c3), c1)
  edgval(c3)
  eqnetrd((c0 ` c1), emptycls, ((iEdg ` c4)` c1), (w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))))
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))), (c0 ` c1)=((iEdg ` c4)` c1), Fun((iEdg ` c4)), c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  adantr(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), Fun((iEdg ` c4)))
  simpr2(w0, c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4), c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4), (Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))
  adantr(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), c1 ‚àà dom(c0))
  eqcomd((c0 ` c1), ((iEdg ` c4)` c1), (Fun((iEdg ` c4))‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß c1 ‚àà dom(c0)))
  funssfv((iEdg ` c4), c0, c1)
  syl3anc((w0 ‚àß(c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2))), ((iEdg ` c4)` c1)‚â† ‚àÖ, c4 ‚àà UHGraph, (iEdg ` c4)[Fn]dom((iEdg ` c4)), c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c4)))
  adantr(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), c4 ‚àà UHGraph)
  adantr(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), (iEdg ` c4)[Fn]dom((iEdg ` c4)))
  funfnd((iEdg ` c4), w0)
  syl(w0, Fun((iEdg ` c4)), c4 ‚àà UHGraph)
  uhgrfun(c4, (iEdg ` c4))
  adantr(w0, (c2 ‚äÜ(Vtx ` c4)‚àß c0 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c4)‚àß(Edg ` c3)‚äÜ P(c2)), c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c4)), c3[SubGraph]c4, c1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c3)))
  syl6eleq(c1, dom((iEdg ` c3)), dom(c0), w0)
  dmeqi(c0, (iEdg ` c3))
  subgreldmiedg(c3, c4, c1)
  uhgrn0(c4, (iEdg ` c4), dom((iEdg ` c4)), c1)
  eqid((iEdg ` c4))
  eldifsn((c0 ` c1), P(c2), emptycls)
}

blocks.name: subumgredg2
blocks.content: An edge of a subgraph of a multigraph connects exactly two different vertices. (Contributed by AV, 26-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm subumgredg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))), wcel(cfv(c3, c2), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl6eleq(cfv(c3, c2), crab(s0, cpw(c4), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c4), csn(emptycls)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))))
  elrabd(s0, cfv(c3, c2), cdif(cpw(c4), csn(emptycls)), w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c2)), nat2))
  fveqeq2(cv(s0), cfv(c3, c2), chash, nat2)
  subgruhgredgd(c3, c2, c4, c0, c1, w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))))
  3ad2ant2(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wcel(c1, cuhgr))
  simp1(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c2)), nat2, cfv(chash, cfv(cfv(ciedg, c1), c2)), w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))))
  fveq2d(chash, cfv(c3, c2), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c1), c2), w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))))
  syl3anc(w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(c3, c2), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c1), c2)), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c1)), wss(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))
  3ad2ant2(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c1, cumgr), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c1)), wcel(c1, cuhgr))
  umgruhgr(c1)
  uhgrfun(c1, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wss(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1)))
  simp2d(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wss(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1)), wss(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cvtx, c1)), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  subgrprop2(c0, c1, cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cvtx, c1), c3, cfv(ciedg, c1), cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
  simp3(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))
  eqcomd(cfv(c3, c2), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c1), c2), w3a(wfun(cfv(ciedg, c1)), wss(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1)), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))))
  funssfv(cfv(ciedg, c1), c3, c2)
  syl2anc(w3a(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3))), wceq(cfv(chash, cfv(cfv(ciedg, c1), c2)), nat2), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1))))
  simp2(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))
  3imp(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1))))
  a1d(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c1, cumgr), wi(wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1)))))
  syl5bi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1))), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))))
  eleq2i(c2, cdm(c3), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))
  dmeqi(c3, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  ex(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(c2, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c1))))
  subgreldmiedg(c0, c1, c2)
  umgredg2(c1, c2, cfv(ciedg, c1), cfv(cvtx, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c1))
  eqid(cfv(ciedg, c1))
  prprrab(s0, c4)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, cpw(c4), csn(emptycls))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c4)
  diff.csn.s(s0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(chash, cfv(c3, c2)), nat2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, cfv(c3, c2))
  diff.chash.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

thm subumgredg2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3))‚Üí(c3 ` c2)‚àà { s0 ‚àà P(c4)|(# ` s0)= 2 })
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  syl6eleq((c3 ` c2), { s0 ‚àà P(c4)|(# ` s0)= 2 }, { s0 ‚àà(P(c4)\ { ‚àÖ })|(# ` s0)= 2 }, (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3)))
  elrabd(s0, (c3 ` c2), (P(c4)\ { ‚àÖ }), (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3)), (# ` s0)= 2, (# `(c3 ` c2))= 2)
  fveqeq2(s0, (c3 ` c2), chash, nat2)
  subgruhgredgd(c3, c2, c4, c0, c1, (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3)))
  3ad2ant2(c0[SubGraph]c1, c1 ‚àà UMGraph, c2 ‚àà dom(c3), c1 ‚àà UHGraph)
  simp1(c0[SubGraph]c1, c1 ‚àà UMGraph, c2 ‚àà dom(c3))
  eqtrd((# `(c3 ` c2)), nat2, (# `((iEdg ` c1)` c2)), (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3)))
  fveq2d(chash, (c3 ` c2), ((iEdg ` c1)` c2), (c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3)))
  syl3anc((c0[SubGraph]c1 ‚àß c1 ‚àà UMGraph ‚àß c2 ‚àà dom(c3)), (c3 ` c2)=((iEdg ` c1)` c2), Fun((iEdg ` c1)), c3 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c1), c2 ‚àà dom(c3))
  3ad2ant2(c0[SubGraph]c1, c1 ‚àà UMGraph, c2 ‚àà dom(c3), Fun((iEdg ` c1)))
  syl(c1 ‚àà UMGraph, Fun((iEdg ` c1)), c1 ‚àà UHGraph)
  umgruhgr(c1)
  uhgrfun(c1, (iEdg ` c1))
  3ad2ant1(c0[SubGraph]c1, c1 ‚àà UMGraph, c2 ‚àà dom(c3), c3 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c1))
  simp2d(c0[SubGraph]c1, c3 ‚äÜ(iEdg ` c1), (Vtx ` c0)‚äÜ(Vtx ` c1), (Edg ` c0)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c0)))
  subgrprop2(c0, c1, (Vtx ` c0), (Vtx ` c1), c3, (iEdg ` c1), (Edg ` c0))
  eqid((Vtx ` c0))

blocks.name: subusgr
blocks.content: A subgraph of a simple graph is a simple graph. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: uhgrspansubgrlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ uhgrspansubgr : The edges of the graph ` S ` obtained by removing some edges of a hypergraph ` G ` are subsets of its vertices (a spanning subgraph, see comment for ~ uhgrspansubgr . (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2020.)

thm uhgrspansubgrlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(cedg, c0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cres(c3, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cuhgr))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wss(cfv(cedg, c0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4)))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(cedg, c0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), w0)

  eleq2i(cv(hs0), cfv(cedg, c0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0)))

  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), crn(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wrex(hs1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1))))), wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)))
  mpbird(w0, wfun(cfv(ciedg, c0)), wfun(cres(c3, c5)))
  3syl(w0, wfun(cres(c3, c5)), wcel(c2, cuhgr), wfun(c3))
  uhgrfun(c2, c3)

  elrnrexdmb(hs1, cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs0))
  rexlimdva(hs1, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wcel(cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cfv(cres(c3, c5), cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))))
  fveq1d(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1), cres(c3, c5), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cres(c3, c5)))
  fvresd(c3, c5, cv(hs1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c5))
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), c5), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c5, cdm(c3))))
  elinel1(cv(hs1), c5, cdm(c3))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), c1))
  syl2an2r(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(c2, cuhgr), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c3)))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c3)))
  syl6bi(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c5, cdm(c3))))

  syl6bb(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0)))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wss(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), c1), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cpw(c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(cfv(ciedg, c0))), wb(wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cpw(c1))))

  elpw(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), c1)
  fvex(c3, cv(hs1))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(ciedg, c0), cv(hs1)), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cedg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ciedg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))
}

thm uhgrspansubgrlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(Edg ` c0)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c0)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Vtx ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(iEdg ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Vtx ` c0)= c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 |` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà UHGraph)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(Edg ` c0)‚äÜ P((Vtx ` c0))), (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4))
  ssrdv(hs0, (Edg ` c0), P((Vtx ` c0)), w0)
  syl5bi(w0, hs0 ‚àà(Edg ` c0), hs0 ‚àà P((Vtx ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  eleq2i(hs0, (Edg ` c0), ran((iEdg ` c0)))
  edgval(c0)
  sylbid(w0, hs0 ‚àà ran((iEdg ` c0)), hs0 ‚àà P((Vtx ` c0)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs0 =((iEdg ` c0)` hs1)))
  syl(w0, (hs0 ‚àà ran((iEdg ` c0))‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs0 =((iEdg ` c0)` hs1))), Fun((iEdg ` c0)))
  mpbird(w0, Fun((iEdg ` c0)), Fun((c3 |` c5)))
  3syl(w0, Fun((c3 |` c5)), c2 ‚àà UHGraph, Fun(c3))
  uhgrfun(c2, c3)
  funres(c3, c5)
  funeqd((iEdg ` c0), (c3 |` c5), w0)
  elrnrexdmb(hs1, (iEdg ` c0), hs0)
  rexlimdva(hs1, dom((iEdg ` c0)), w0, hs0 =((iEdg ` c0)` hs1), hs0 ‚àà P((Vtx ` c0)))
  syl5ibrcom((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0))), hs0 =((iEdg ` c0)` hs1), hs0 ‚àà P((Vtx ` c0)), ((iEdg ` c0)` hs1)‚àà P((Vtx ` c0)))
  eqeltrd(((iEdg ` c0)` hs1), P((Vtx ` c0)), (c3 ` hs1), (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0))))
  eqtrd(((iEdg ` c0)` hs1), (c3 ` hs1), ((c3 |` c5)` hs1), (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0))))
  fveq1d((iEdg ` c0), hs1, (c3 |` c5), (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0))))
  adantr(w0, hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), (iEdg ` c0)=(c3 |` c5))
  fvresd(c3, c5, hs1, (w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0))))
  imp(w0, hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs1 ‚àà c5)
  syl6bi(w0, hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs1 ‚àà c5, hs1 ‚àà(c5 ‚ãÇ dom(c3)))
  elinel1(hs1, c5, dom(c3))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0))), (c3 ` hs1)‚àà P((Vtx ` c0)), (c3 ` hs1)‚äÜ c1)
  syl2an2r(w0, hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), (c3 ` hs1)‚äÜ c1, c2 ‚àà UHGraph, hs1 ‚àà dom(c3))
  imp(w0, hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs1 ‚àà dom(c3))
  syl6bi(w0, hs1 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` c0)), hs1 ‚àà dom(c3), hs1 ‚àà(c5 ‚ãÇ dom(c3)))
  eleq2d(hs1, dom((iEdg ` c0)), (c5 ‚ãÇ dom(c3)), w0)
  syl6eq(dom((iEdg ` c0)), (c5 ‚ãÇ dom(c3)), dom((c3 |` c5)), w0)
  dmeqd((iEdg ` c0), (c3 |` c5), w0)
  dmres(c3, c5)

blocks.name: uhgrspansubgr
blocks.content: A spanning subgraph ` S ` of a hypergraph ` G ` is actually a subgraph of ` G ` . A subgraph ` S ` of a graph ` G ` which has the same vertices as ` G ` and is obtained by removing some edges of ` G ` is called a _spanning subgraph_ (see section I.1 in [Bollobas] p. 2 and section 1.1 in [Diestel] p. 4). Formally, the edges are "removed" by restricting the edge function of the original graph by an arbitrary class (which actually needs not to be a subset of the domain of the edge function). (Contributed by AV, 18-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm uhgrspansubgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, csubgr, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cres(c3, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cuhgr))
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wss(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2), wss(cfv(ciedg, c0), c3), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))
  syl5sseq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(cvtx, c0), w0)
  ssid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  syl6eqss(cfv(ciedg, c0), c3, cres(c3, c5), w0)
  resss(c3, c5)
  uhgrspansubgrlem(c0, c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), w3a(wss(cfv(cvtx, c0), c2), wss(cfv(ciedg, c0), c3), wss(cfv(cedg, c0), cpw(cfv(cvtx, c0))))), wcel(c1, cuhgr), wfun(c3), wcel(c0, c4))
  syl(w0, wfun(c3), wcel(c1, cuhgr))
  uhgrfun(c1, c3)
  issubgr2(c1, cuhgr, c3, c0, c4, cfv(cvtx, c0), c2, cfv(ciedg, c0), cfv(cedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cvtx, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ciedg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cedg, c0))
}

thm uhgrspansubgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[SubGraph]c1)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(iEdg ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Vtx ` c0)= c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 |` c5))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà UHGraph)

blocks.name: uhgrspan1
blocks.content: The induced subgraph ` S ` of a hypergraph ` G ` obtained by removing one vertex is actually a subgraph of ` G ` . A subgraph is called _induced_ or _spanned_ by a subset of vertices of a graph if it contains all edges of the original graph that join two vertices of the subgraph (see section I.1 in [Bollobas] p. 2 and section 1.1 in [Diestel] p. 4). (Contributed by AV, 19-Nov-2020.)

thm uhgrspan1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  -| wceq(c3, cop(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cres(c4, c5)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpbir3and(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c3, csubgr, c0), wss(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), c2), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c3), cres(c4, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3)))), wss(cima(c4, c5), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  difssd(c2, csn(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  mp1i(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c3), cres(c4, cdm(cfv(ciedg, c3)))), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c3), cres(c4, c5)))
  resresdm(cfv(ciedg, c3), c4, c5)
  ssrdv(hs0, cima(c4, c5), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  syld(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wrex(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, c5)), wrex(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, c5)), wrex(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))), wfun(c4))
  uhgrfun(c0, c4)
  ex(wfun(c4), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(c4, c5)), wrex(hs1, c5, wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  fvelima(hs1, c4, cv(hs0), c5)
  rexlimdv(hs1, c5, wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), c5), wi(wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))))
  elrab2(s0, cv(hs1), c5, cdm(c4), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  neleq12d(c1, cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  eqidd(c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), c4)
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1)))), wi(wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1)))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), universe), wss(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), c2), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))
  fvexd(c4, cv(hs1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))), wss(cfv(c4, cv(hs1)), c2))

  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cuhgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdm(c4)), wnel(c1, cfv(c4, cv(hs1))))

  a1i(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, universe))
  eqeltri(c3, universe, cop(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cres(c4, c5)))
  opex(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cres(c4, c5))
  issubgr(c0, cuhgr, c3, universe, cdif(c2, csn(c1)), c2, cfv(ciedg, c3), c4, cima(c4, c5))
  eqcomi(cdif(c2, csn(c1)), cfv(cvtx, c3))

  3eqtr4ri(cima(c4, c5), cfv(cedg, c3), crn(cfv(ciedg, c3)), crn(cres(c4, c5)))

  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))))

thm uhgrspan1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3[SubGraph]c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(iEdg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 = { s0 ‚àà dom(c4)| c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` s0)}
  ‚ä£ c3 = <(c2 \ { c1 }),(c4 |` c5)>
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpbir3and((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3[SubGraph]c0, (c2 \ { c1 })‚äÜ c2, (iEdg ` c3)=(c4 |` dom((iEdg ` c3))), (c4 " c5)‚äÜ P((c2 \ { c1 })))
  difssd(c2, { c1 }, (c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (iEdg ` c3)=(c4 |` dom((iEdg ` c3))), (iEdg ` c3)=(c4 |` c5))
  resresdm((iEdg ` c3), c4, c5)
  ssrdv(hs0, (c4 " c5), P((c2 \ { c1 })), (c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  syld((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà(c4 " c5), hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 })), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c5,(c4 ` hs1)= hs0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà UHGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àà(c4 " c5)‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c5,(c4 ` hs1)= hs0)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà UHGraph, (hs0 ‚àà(c4 " c5)‚Üí ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c5,(c4 ` hs1)= hs0)), Fun(c4))
  uhgrfun(c0, c4)
  ex(Fun(c4), hs0 ‚àà(c4 " c5), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c5,(c4 ` hs1)= hs0))
  fvelima(hs1, c4, hs0, c5)
  rexlimdv(hs1, c5, (c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c4 ` hs1)= hs0, hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 })))
  syl5bi((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), hs1 ‚àà c5, ((c4 ` hs1)= hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))), (hs1 ‚àà dom(c4)‚àß c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1)))
  elrab2(s0, hs1, c5, dom(c4), c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1), c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` s0))
  neleq12d(c1, (c4 ` s0), c1, (c4 ` hs1), s0 = hs1)
  eqidd(c1, s0 = hs1)
  fveq2(s0, hs1, c4)
  ex((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (hs1 ‚àà dom(c4)‚àß c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1)), ((c4 ` hs1)= hs0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))))
  syl5ibrcom(((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà dom(c4)‚àß c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1))), (c4 ` hs1)= hs0, hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 })), (c4 ` hs1)‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 })))
  syl3anc(((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà dom(c4)‚àß c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1))), (c4 ` hs1)‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 })), (c4 ` hs1)‚àà ùïå, (c4 ` hs1)‚äÜ c2, c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1))
  fvexd(c4, hs1, ((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß(hs1 ‚àà dom(c4)‚àß c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1))))
  ad2ant2r(c0 ‚àà UHGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, hs1 ‚àà dom(c4), c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1), (c4 ` hs1)‚äÜ c2)
  uhgrss(c0, hs1, c4, c2)
  simprr((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), hs1 ‚àà dom(c4), c1 ‚àâ(c4 ` hs1))
  elpwdifsn((c4 ` hs1), universe, c2, c1)
  eqcoms((c4 ` hs1), hs0, (hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))‚Üî(c4 ` hs1)‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))))
  eleq1(hs0, (c4 ` hs1), P((c2 \ { c1 })))
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà UHGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, (c3[SubGraph]c0 ‚Üî((c2 \ { c1 })‚äÜ c2 ‚àß(iEdg ` c3)=(c4 |` dom((iEdg ` c3)))‚àß(c4 " c5)‚äÜ P((c2 \ { c1 })))), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltri(c3, universe, <(c2 \ { c1 }),(c4 |` c5)>)
  opex((c2 \ { c1 }), (c4 |` c5))
  issubgr(c0, cuhgr, c3, universe, (c2 \ { c1 }), c2, (iEdg ` c3), c4, (c4 " c5))
  eqcomi((c2 \ { c1 }), (Vtx ` c3))
  uhgrspan1lem2(s0, c3, c2, c1, c0, c4, c5)
  eqid((iEdg ` c3))
  3eqtr4ri((c4 " c5), (Edg ` c3), ran((iEdg ` c3)), ran((c4 |` c5)))
  rneqi((iEdg ` c3), (c4 |` c5))
  uhgrspan1lem3(s0, c3, c4, c5, c2, c0, c1)
  edgval(c3)
  df-ima(c4, c5)
  diff.hs0.c((c4 " c5))
  diff.hs0.c(P((c2 \ { c1 })))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà UHGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 })))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c4)
  diff.wnel.s(s0, c1, (c4 ` hs1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

  imp4b(wcel(c0, cupgr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c3)), wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))))

  com23(wf(c3, cdm(c3), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(c2), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2))), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c3)), wi(wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cdif(cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), csn(emptycls)), wbr(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cle, nat2)))))

  ‚ä£ c3 =(iEdg ` c0)

thm umgrreslem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(crn(cres(c3, c4)), crab(s0, cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s1, cdm(c3), wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl5eqssr(crn(cres(c3, c4)), crab(s0, cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)), cima(c3, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  df-ima(c3, c4)
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cima(c3, c4), crab(s0, cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))), wral(hs0, c4, wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2)))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, c4, wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))))
  syl5bi(wa(wcel(c0, cumgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, cpw(cdif(c2, csn(c1))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s0)), nat2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c3)), wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))))
  elrab2(s1, cv(hs0), c4, cdm(c3), wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))))
  syl(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wb(wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(s1))), wnel(c1, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s1)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))))

blocks.content: A pseudograph obtained by removing one vertex and all edges incident with this vertex is a pseudograph. blocks.name: umgrres1
blocks.content: A multigraph obtained by removing one vertex and all edges incident with this vertex is a multigraph. Remark: This graph is not a subgraph of the original graph in the sense of ~ df-subgr since the domains of the edge functions may not be compatible. (Contributed by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

blocks.name: usgrres1
blocks.content: Restricting a simple graph by removing one vertex results in a simple graph. Remark: This restricted graph is not a subgraph of the original graph in the sense of ~ df-subgr since the domains of the edge functions may not be compatible. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 10-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Nov-2020.)

thm usgrres1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c3 ‚àà USGraph)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Vtx ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Edg ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 = { s0 ‚àà c4 | c1 ‚àâ s0 }
  ‚ä£ c3 = <(c2 \ { c1 }),(= |` c5)>
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), c3 ‚àà USGraph, ((= |` c5): dom((= |` c5))‚Ü£ { hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))|(# ` hs0)= 2 }))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((= |` c5): dom((= |` c5))‚Ü£ { hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))|(# ` hs0)= 2 }), ((= |` c5): dom((= |` c5))‚Ü£ c5), ran((= |` c5))‚äÜ { hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))|(# ` hs0)= 2 })
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((= |` c5): dom((= |` c5))‚Ü£ c5), ((= |` c5): c5 ‚Ü£ c5))
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ((= |` c5): c5 ‚Ü£ c5), ((= |` c5): c5 ‚Üî c5))
  f1oi(c5)
  f1of1((= |` c5), c5, c5)
  f1eq123d((= |` c5), dom((= |` c5)), c5, (= |` c5), c5, c5, (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqidd((= |` c5), (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), dom((= |` c5))= c5)
  dmresi(c5)
  eqidd(c5, (c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  sylan(c0 ‚àà USGraph, c1 ‚àà c2, ran((= |` c5))‚äÜ { hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))|(# ` hs0)= 2 }, c0 ‚àà UMGraph)
  usgrumgr(c0)
  umgrres1lem(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c5, c4)
  f1ssr((= |` c5), dom((= |` c5)), c5, { hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))|(# ` hs0)= 2 })
  mp1i((c0 ‚àà USGraph ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c3 ‚àà USGraph ‚Üî((= |` c5): dom((= |` c5))‚Ü£ { hs0 ‚àà P((c2 \ { c1 }))|(# ` hs0)= 2 })), c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  eqeltri(c3, universe, <(c2 \ { c1 }),(= |` c5)>)
  opex((c2 \ { c1 }), (= |` c5))
  isusgrs(hs0, c3, universe, (= |` c5), (c2 \ { c1 }))
  eqcomi((c2 \ { c1 }), (Vtx ` c3))
  upgrres1lem2(s0, c3, c2, c1, c0, c4, c5)
  eqcomi((= |` c5), (iEdg ` c3))
  upgrres1lem3(s0, c3, c5, c2, c0, c4, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
